summary: Mission v9.6.4 'Zéro Vide Noir et Flux Login' - ALL FEATURES VERIFIED. 1) Video paddingTop reduced to 5px (PartnersCarousel L202), 2) Header paddingTop/Bottom at 0px (PartnersCarousel L602-603), 3) Reels container height at 90vh (App.js L3760), 4) Login modal reorganized with Google button at TOP and Devenir Partenaire at BOTTOM, 5) Sessions and footer still accessible by scrolling, 6) Search icon (loupe) preserved, 7) Chat widget purple preserved

✅ App.js L3760: height: '90vh' for immersive video effect
✅ CoachLoginModal.js L165: 'Déjà partenaire ?' label at TOP
✅ CoachLoginModal.js L167-186: Google login button at TOP (data-testid='google-login-btn')
✅ CoachLoginModal.js L195-212: 'Devenir Partenaire' button at BOTTOM (data-testid='become-partner-btn')
✅ Super Admin (afroboost.bassi@gmail.com) has unlimited credits verified via /api/credits/check

success_rate.frontend: 100% - All v9.6.4 UI features verified via Playwright

context_for_next_testing_agent: Mission v9.6.4 verified all features: (1) ZÉRO VIDE NOIR achieved with paddingTop=5px and 90vh video height, (2) Login modal reorganized with clear hierarchy: 'Déjà partenaire?' + Google button at top, separator 'ou', then 'Devenir Partenaire' button at bottom with violet gradient, (3) All scroll functionality preserved - sessions section and footer '© Afroboost 2026' accessible by scrolling, (4) Search icon (loupe) visible in header, (5) Purple chat widget (#D91CD2) preserved
